C

calculatePayment() - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.MoneyInputPanel
Using amount due and amount paid values, determines whether an order has been paid for or not and calculates payment still due/change due accordingly.
checkDiscount(OrderItem) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Discount
Uses the number of items gathered from checkDiscount() to determine if a discount should be applied, and applies the discounts accordingly.
checkQuantities() - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Discount
Determines how many of each product (Pizza/Drink/Side) are currently contained within the 'itemArray' arraylist inside the Order.
closeOrder() - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Till
Closes the current order by setting the 'newOrder' "template" object to null.
ControlPanel - Class in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui
Allows user to perform system-wide operations within the application including creating a new order, printing receipts and generating 'end of the day' reports.
ControlPanel(Till, DisplayBasePanel) - Constructor for class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.ControlPanel
Instantiates a new Control Panel.
CostDisplayPanel - Class in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui
Displays the financial information related to a particular Order.
CostDisplayPanel() - Constructor for class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.CostDisplayPanel
Instantiates a new Cost Display Panel.
createNewDrink(Size, DrinkType, int) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order
Creates a new Drink object using data retrieved from the GUI.
createNewOrder(String) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Till
Creates a new customer order by initialising the 'newOrder' "template" object as a new Order.
createNewPizza(Size, PizzaType, int) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order
Creates a new Pizza object using data retrieved from the GUI.
createNewSide(Size, SideType, int) - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order
